ai.tecton.client

Class TectonClientOptions

  • Object
    • TectonClientOptions

  • public class TectonClientOptions
extends Object
    A class that provides custom configuration options for the underlying Http Client. The Client currently supports customizing the following configurations:
    • Read Timeout - Default = 5s
    • Connect Timeout - Default = 5s
    • Max Idle Connections - Default = 5
    • Keep Alive Duration - Default = 5mins
    • Max Parallel Requests - Default = 5

    • Nested Class Summary

      A Builder class for creating an instance of TectonClientOptions object with specific configurations
